name: Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League - Season 02
summary:
Do you feel that chill in the air? Our season 2 update is on the way.

Head on over to our blog where we’ll be taking you through all of the new content we’re adding to Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League as part of the Season of Frozen Hearts.

You'll get to meet the latest addition to the Squad, Mrs. Freeze and the inhospitable new Elseworld that she hails from, along with some of the new gear you'll be able to get your hand on to freeze, melt and obliterate Brainiac and his forces.

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League - Official Season 2 'Meet Mrs. Freeze' Launch Trailer
